scripts.clean: for /D %p in (packages\*) do ((if exist "%p\dist" (echo Deleting folder: "%p\dist" & rd /s /q "%p\dist")) & (if exist "%p\tsconfig.tsbuildinfo" (echo Deleting folder: "%p\tsconfig.tsbuildinfo" & del /f /q "%p\tsconfig.tsbuildinfo")))
scripts.complete-build: npm run clean & npm run build
scripts.complete-pack: npm run clean & npm run build & npm run pack & npm run clean
